Tinley_Park.Orland Park 153rd Street station: Orland Park 153rd Street is a station on Metra's SouthWest Service in Orland Park, Illinois. The station is 25.2 miles (40.6 km) away from Union Station, the northern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, 153rd Street is in zone E. Unlike all other stations on the SouthWest Service (besides Union Station), tickets are sold here.
